H0.text: Protons and neutrons are made up of quarks, which are very tiny particles of matter.

H1.text: Electrons and neutrons are made up of quarks.

H2.text: Protons and electrons are very tiny particles of matter that quarks make up.

H3.text: Atoms and neutrons are made up of quarks, which are very tiny particles of matter.

A4.text: Quarks combine to form composite particles called hadrons, the most stable of which are protons and neutrons, the components of atomic nuclei.

A5.text: All commonly observable matter is composed of up quarks, down quarks and electrons.
